price: Je! Huu ni uchawi, au hamwoni tu?
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: Je! Bado mnaendelea kuukanya. Huu Moto mnao uona ni uchawi, au hamwoni tu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
